Analyzing OpenAPI spec for /ArkShareGroup POST endpoint. Identifying request and response schemas. The request requires `group_id: string`. The response requires `status: string (const 'ok')`, `retcode: number`, `data: string`, `message: string`, `wording: string`, `echo: string (nullable)`. Modifying `ArksharegroupReq` to include `group_id: str`. Modifying `ArksharegroupRes` to include all required fields with correct types, descriptions using `Field`, and handling the nullable `echo` field using `str | None`. Setting `status` default to 'ok'. Removing unused import `Any`. Ensuring type hints and descriptions are present.
